comment: Copy this to your project's .claude/tools.json (NOT in worktrees)

tools.name: spawn_task
tools.description: Create an isolated git worktree and spawn a separate Claude CLI instance to work on a specific task in parallel. Use this to delegate independent sub-tasks.

description.description: Detailed description of what needs to be done

baseBranch.description: Base branch to create worktree from (optional, defaults to 'develop')

tools.name: check_tasks
tools.description: Check all active tasks for completion and automatically merge completed ones back to the base branch

tools.name: list_tasks
tools.description: List all active and recently completed tasks for the current project
